channel.title: Terraform on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Terraform on Modernization workshop

item.title: Cloud Automation at Scale with Quali
item.description: Gain hands-on experience with Quali, an AWS advanced technology ISV partner, to automatically deploy and release an e-commerce application as part of your DevOps practice.

item.title: Build a modern architecture with GitLab, Hashicorp and Gremlin
item.description: In this workshop we will work with GitLab, Hashicorp and Gremlin to show how to detect single points of failure within a gitflow deployment.
